snippet.title: Max Mustard Official Trailer | PlayStation VR2
snippet.description:
Experience the ultimate VR platformer on PSVR2!
Play Max Mustard now: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10009845/

Finalist for XR Game of the Year 2024, Max Mustard is an immersive VR platformer featuring 40 unique levels, creative first-person gadgets, and non-stop action that makes it impossible to put down!

So get ready to experience the ultimate VR platformer with enhanced visuals, resolution, and haptics/rumble exclusively designed to help you get the most out of your PlayStation VR2.

Follow our socials for all the latest updates:
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/RichiesPlankExperience/
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/toast_interactive/
Twitter - https://x.com/MaxMustardGame
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@toastinteractive
